body.name: Flash Furniture FLASH MOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount with Built-In Level - Max VESA Size 200 x 200mm - Fits most TV's 17"- 42" (Weight Capacity 66LB)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 43 mins
features: Free up room for décor or keep your space open and airy when you get your television up on the wall with a tv wall mount. Keep your screen safe from little hands and give an elegant look to any room in your home or business.
FIXED WALL MOUNT: Slim side profile extends a mere 1" from the wall, built-in level for accuracy and accommodates VESA sizes 100 x 100mm and 200 x 200mm
QUICK RELEASE: Nylon strings with magnetized pendant ends allow you easily release the TV from the bracket, attach magnet ends to frame to keep out of sight, mounts to drywall, brick and concrete
DURABLE TV WALL BRACKET: Fixed design made from strong durable steel provides support for heavy TV's, holds up to 66 lbs. weight capacity
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 9.75"W x 1"D x 8.75"H
body.description: Whether you have a smaller TV in the kitchen to follow along with the celebrity chef or a larger model elsewhere for family entertainment, give yourself peace of mind knowing that it's securely mounted with this black fixed TV wall mount. The universal design allows for use with multiple brands of TV's, fits most sizes from 17" - 42" (VESA size 100 x 100mm and 200 x 200mm) and will hold up to 66 pounds weight capacity. Great for doctor's offices, daycares or playrooms, mounting your television on the wall creates a sharp, on-trend look and puts your viewing screen up where little hands can't get to it. Strength is key to safeguard your possessions when you choose to utilize the vertical space on your walls. The one piece wall plate design is made from heavy duty steel and includes a template to mark your holes for drilling into wall studs, brick or concrete walls and a built-in level to help ensure your TV looks great when you're done. The slim side profile only extends 1" from the wall for a sleek design. If you decide to move things around, simply pull down on the nylon strings to release the TV from the bracket. After hanging your TV, the magnetic pendants at the end of the strings will attach to the frame to keep them out of sight. No matter the size of your screen, you don't want the expense of having to replace your TV. This low profile fixed TV wall mount assembles in less than 30 minutes and includes all the hardware you need. Let this flush TV wall mount help you create a sophisticated, modern appearance in your living room, bedroom, kitchen, mancave or she shed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Full Motion, Tilt or Fixed TV Wall Mount Give yourself peace of mind knowing that your TV is securely mounted with one of these heavy duty mounts.

Easy Assembly Assemble this TV Mount in 30 Minutes or less with just three easy steps. The mount includes wall template and mounting hardware. Universal Design The universal design allows for use with multiple brands of TV's, fits most sizes from 40" - 84" (VESA size 100 x 100mm, 200 x 200mm, 400 x 400mm, 600 x 400mm) and will hold up to 100 pounds weight capacity. Heavy Duty Construction The one piece wall plate design is made from heavy duty steel and includes a template to mark your holes for drilling into wall studs, brick or concrete walls and a built-in level to help ensure your TV looks great when you're done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Affordable and extremely sturdy! It has a level which made assembly even easier. As you can see in the photo, it comes with lots of screw options so it is compatible with any tv. Our tv was a little tricky and my husband was concerned the mount wouldn’t have what we needed, but it did! I would definitely order this again!

reviews.reviewText: worked for what i wanted but sent instructions for a completely different mount

reviews.reviewText: Great little mount - small but mighty! Quick and easy install and have no issues with my 42 inch Roku tv hanging from it.
